import React from "react"; import "./../Styles/AiInterview.css"; const AIinterview = () => { const [time, setTime] = useState(6); // starting seconds useEffect(() => { if (time === 0) return; // stop at 0 const interval = setInterval(() => { setTime((prev) => prev - 1); }, 1000); return () => clearInterval(interval); // cleanup }, [time]); return ( <> <>
